name: Tilescapes Connect
description:
Tilescapes Connect is the free-to-play, addictive tile-matching puzzle game! Tap identical tiles and connect them as fast as you can to crush this pair matching puzzle game with thousands of challenging levels! Match animal pairs, flower pairs, food pairs and more to improve your memory and train your brain!

HOW TO PLAY?
Tilescapes Connect is an extremely easy-to-play THEMED tile matching game for all ages!
1. Your mission? Clear the board of all tiles before time runs out
2. Connect matching tiles to eliminate rows and lines
3. Level up & earn coins to power-up and complete the most challenging levels

SPECIAL FEATURES
- Unlock 40+ fun TILE SETS: Wildlife, Seashore, Desserts, Animals, Drinks, and more!
- Relax with over 30 beautiful puzzle BACKGROUNDS: Northern Lights, Beach, Forest, Cherry Blossoms, and more!
- Move up the map by collecting stars and leveling up
- Progress even faster with special link game power-ups: Hint, Rotate, Bomb, Shuffle, and a Rocket that blasts 4 TILES at once
- Never miss a beat with the Revive After Fail feature
- Log in every day to collect your Daily Bonus!
- Get your FREE prize from the Lucky Spin wheel of fortune!

HIGHLIGHTS
- Play offline! No Wi-Fi needed
- Play on any device (phone & tablet friendly)
- Play without audio if you’re on the go
- Suitable for all ages
- Multiple languages supported
- Tilescapes Connect costs nothing to download and play!

BRAIN TRAINING BENEFITS
Inspired by the classic, ancient Chinese tile-based game of Mahjong: Tilescapes Connect is bound to get your cogs turning, as well as offering a number of other mental health benefits.
- Acting as a “mind sport” - Tilescapes Connect is designed to train your brain while captivating you through challenging, themed levels
- Wind down after a long day by relieving stress & relaxing with an intuitive puzzle game
- Stimulate your brain in a low-stress environment with puzzles and incredibly cute graphics

Download now to play Tilescapes Connect free on iOS, one of the best free puzzle games of 2022! Do you have what it takes to become a true tile-matching master?
